Classes/SKTilemap.html.name: SKTilemap
Classes/SKTilemap.html.abstract: The SKTilemap class is a mappable container for managing layers of tiles (sprites),

Classes/SKTileset.html.name: SKTileset
Classes/SKTileset.html.abstract: The SKTileset class manages a set of SKTilesetData objects, which store tile data including global id, texture and animation.

Classes/TiledLayerObject.html.name: TiledLayerObject
Classes/TiledLayerObject.html.abstract: The TiledLayerObject is the base class for all SKTiled layer types.

Classes/SKTileLayer.html.name: SKTileLayer
Classes/SKTileLayer.html.abstract: Subclass of TiledLayerObject, the tile layer is a container for an array of tiles (sprites). Tiles maintain a link to the map’s tileset via their SKTilesetData property.

Classes/SKObjectGroup.html.name: SKObjectGroup
Classes/SKObjectGroup.html.abstract: The SKObjectGroup class is a container for vector object types. Most object properties can be set on the parent SKObjectGroup which is then applied to all child objects.

Classes/SKGroupLayer.html.name: SKGroupLayer
Classes/SKGroupLayer.html.abstract: Subclass of TiledLayerObject, the SKGroupLayer node is a container for managing groups of layers.

Classes/SKImageLayer.html.name: SKImageLayer
Classes/SKImageLayer.html.abstract: The SKImageLayer object is really nothing more than a sprite with positioning attributes.

Classes/SKTile.html.name: SKTile
Classes/SKTile.html.abstract: The SKTile class is a custom SpriteKit sprite node that references its image and animation data from a tileset container. The tile represents a single piece of a larger image stored in a tile layer container.

Classes/SKTilesetData.html.name: SKTilesetData
Classes/SKTilesetData.html.abstract: The SKTilesetData structure stores data for a single tileset tile, referencing the tile texture or animation frames (for animated tiles).

Classes/SKTileObject.html.name: SKTileObject
Classes/SKTileObject.html.abstract: The SKTileObject class represents a Tiled vector object type (rectangle, ellipse, polygon, point & polyline).

Classes/SKTiledScene.html.name: SKTiledScene
Classes/SKTiledScene.html.abstract: The SKTiledScene object represents a scene of content in SpriteKit, customized for including Tiled asset types. This scene type automatically creates camera and world container nodes and sets up interactivity between them and an associated tile map node.

Classes/SKTiledSceneCamera.html.name: SKTiledSceneCamera
Classes/SKTiledSceneCamera.html.abstract: The SKTiledSceneCamera is a custom scene camera that responds to finger gestures and mouse events.

Classes/SKTiledGraphNode.html.name: SKTiledGraphNode
Classes/SKTiledGraphNode.html.abstract: The SKTiledGraphNode node is a custom GKGridGraphNode object that adds a weight parameter for

Classes/TileAnimationFrame.html.name: TileAnimationFrame
Classes/TileAnimationFrame.html.abstract: The TileAnimationFrame structure represents a single frame of animation. Time is stored in milliseconds.

Structs/TileFlags.html.name: TileFlags
Structs/TileFlags.html.abstract: The TileFlags optionset represents the various transformation flags that can be set for a given tile.

Structs/TileID.html.name: TileID
Structs/TileID.html.abstract: The TileIDstructure provides an interface to a masked tile id.

Protocols/TilesetDataSource.html#/s:7SKT.abstract: Provide an alernate image name for an image in a collection tileset. Implement this method to allow remapping of images before the tileset is created.
